item.title: Dark matter

item.title: Future colliders
item.description: I support the construction of a new particle collider. I am collecting semi-popular articles about it. [1902.07964] On Future High-Energy Colliders, Gian Giudice [1810.11263] The Future of High-Energy Collider Physics, John Ellis [1809.10426] Future colliders - Linear and circular Siegel, The Simple Case For Why Physics Needs A Particle Collider Beyond The LHC Prescod-Weinstein & Tait, Particle Physics Is Doing Just Fine Castelvecchi, Physicists Lay Out Plans for a New Supercollider Yifang, Inside the plans for Chinese mega-collider that will dwarf the LHC Dorigo, Why We Need A New Collider [1703.
